title: Game of Square
text:
A and B are playing a game. They are given a number N. They make moves in turn, A playing first. Each move consists of subtracting a perfect square (not less than 1) from the number, the player who faces 0 loses. You are given a number N, you have to find out whether A can win the game, if both A and B play optimally.InputThe first line contains T - the number of test cases. The next T lines contain a number n.OutputFor each test case, print "Win" if A can win the game, or else print "Lose", separated by new line.Constraints1 ≤ T; N ≤ 105ExampleInput:5
1
2
3
1
10Output:Win
Lose
Win
Win
Lose
